doc.title: Murder After Dark

credit.role: Detective William Stockwell/Leland Brown/Tubby Wilson/Mystery Woman

doc.plot: On a cool summer night Margaret Ray sits peacefully in her living room. What she doesn't realize is that she is about to be murdered. Now Detective William Stockwell must find the killer. His mission is to interview everyone Margaret knew hoping he will find the person who killed her. The interviews he is sent to turn out to be more bazaar than he would have ever imagined. None of their alibis match and they all could be suspects! His only help on this case is Sheriff Bob and Officer Nicholson. Things heat up in this murder mystery.
